fields.text: Throws countless spinning blades at high speeds, slicing any enemies in your way
Spinning Blades patrol between you and the target area, slicing enemies without remorse
Twirl spinning blades of death around you, instantly filling your foes with regret
Attacks gather charges which add cold damage to dragon finishers while active
Increases attack and movement speed for a period of time
Creates immobile traps that emit charged bolts at nearby enemies
Death Sentry, Lightning Sentry, Shock Web
Attacks gather charges which add lightning damage to dragon finishers while active
Cast a shadow to blind nearby enemies, lowering their defense for a period of time
Reduce all enemy immunities by 40% (20% passively)
Attacks gather charges which add leeching ability to dragon finishers while active
Creates immobile traps that emit magic projectiles and explode the corpses of nearby enemies
Doubles the amount of corpse life converted to damage
Activates charges to perform a quick dual attack, unleashing a burst of lethal damage
Activates charges to perform a teleporting kick, unleashing a burst of lethal damage
Activates charges to perform a high-speed kick, unleashing a burst of lethal damage
Blend in with the shadows, increasing your resistances and curse resiliency
Lob shurikens into the air that explode violently upon impact
Wake of Fire, Wake of Inferno
Attacks gather charges which add fire damage to dragon finishers while active
Lob ice grenades into the air that explode violently upon impact
Creates immobile traps that emit spiraling waves of ice at nearby enemies
Creates immobile traps that emit an ice barrage at nearby enemies
Death Sentry, Frozen Bomb, Frozen Shredder
Creates immobile traps that emit lightning bolts at nearby enemies
Use psionic waves from your mind to stun and convert a group of enemies
Attacks gather charges which add varying elements to dragon finishers while active
Fists of Fire, Claws of Thunder, Blades of Ice
Summons a powerful shadow of yourself that inherits your skills and abilities
Increases Str and Dex of Shadow Master by 50%
+1 Shadow Master for every +7 Summoning Power
Lob tacks into the air that emit electricity on impact
Death Sentry, Charged Bolt Sentry, Lightning Sentry
